trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event occurs after a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>evento ocorre depois que um formulário é fechado por usuário, por meio da interface de usuário (IU), ou programaticamente, por meio de chamadas para métodos, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>em que a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: If a form has any child or owned forms, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event is also raised for each one.
trans-unit.target: Se um formulário tem qualquer filho ou formulários de propriedade, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>evento também é criado para cada um.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The FormClosedEventArgs class provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: A classe FormClosedEventArgs fornece dados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property provides the reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>propriedade fornece o motivo por que o formulário está sendo fechado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The `closeReason` parameter is used to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O `closeReason` parâmetro é usado para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"></xref> value that represents the reason why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"> </xref> valor que representa o motivo por que o formulário foi fechado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o motivo pelo qual o formulário foi fechado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can be closed because of a variety of reasons, both user-initiated and programmatic.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>pode ser fechada devido a uma variedade de razões, iniciado pelo usuário e programáticos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property indicates the reason for the closure.
